data.name: RPG Maker MV - Emotional 2: Voices of Angels
data.detailed_description:
Emotional II: Voices of Angels is the next musical asset album in the Rpg Maker Emotional music pack series composed by Richard John S. Emotional II: Voices of Angels consists of emotional choir and vocal based tracks suitable for the emotional parts to your game projects. In addition, each composition has both fade out and looped versions (please read loop instructions for more details). If you are looking to enhance the emotional moments in your game projects, then Emotional II: Voices of Angels would be an excellent musical pack to deliver upon that extra impact.

Features:

  • 15 emotional BGM tracks.
  • Emotional choir and vocal based compositions.
  • Each track contains both fade out and looped versions (please read loop instructions for more details).
  • ,m4a, .mp3 and .ogg file formats are included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

1 - A World We Once Dreamed Of
2 - An Angel by My Side
3 - Beautiful Sorrow
4 - Carry Me Home on Your Wings
5 - Distant Memories
6 - Follow Your Dreams
7 - In Loving Memory...
8 - It's Hard To Say Goodbye
9 - Overwhelmed With Despair
10 - Remembrance and Heartache
11 - Rest in Peace
12 - Tears Falling From Heaven
13 - The Place Where Angels Go
14 - There Were Better Times
15 - This Lonely Path

data.short_description: Emotional choirs and vocals. Enhance the emotional moments to your game projects with the voices of angels.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
